delivery.question: How fast do I receive my activation code?
delivery.answer: Delivery is instant. We email the activation code, installation instructions, and a downloadable invoice immediately after payment clears.

authenticity.question: Are these licenses legitimate?
authenticity.answer: Yes. We source activation codes directly from authorized distributors and publishers. Every license can be verified with the original provider.

installation.question: Will you help me install the software?
installation.answer: Absolutely. Softblaze provides step-by-step guides and optional remote assistance for enterprise deployments.

support.question: What if I lose my key?
support.answer: Your keys live in your Softblaze account. You can re-download invoices and activation codes anytime, and our team can assist if you need archival copies.
